casebody.data:
WOODLIEF
v.
MECKLENBURG COUNTY. No. 161P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2006. Robert Hagemann, Senior Assistant City Attorney, for Mecklenburg County, et al. William H. Sturges, Charlotte, for Insite Engineering, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th day of April 2006 by Plaintiff to Dismiss Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of May 2006."
